title: Stdlib: AWAIT_SHARED (requires shared store)
description: Demonstrates AWAIT_SHARED with TRY/CATCH. In the playground, the shared store is not configured, so the call will throw.
program: LET result = TRY AWAIT_SHARED("cache", "ready") CATCH (err) => "error: " + err;

input.note: In production set a SharedStoreProvider; here we catch the missing-store error.
